author: jberry
msg: Don't rely on global .SILENT to keep make quiet. Override default rules to shut them up, and give .SILENT particular targets to shut up...it doesn't want to do the same for default rules

author: jberry
msg: Add default support for prettier make output, inspired by Axel Weis.
will turn it on or off at configure time.
- If it's been configured on, you may temporarilly override it at run
time with "make VERBOSE=1". This is almost the same as the default, though
a is a bit more quiet.

author: dnaber
msg: not public anymore + javadoc fixes (by Paul Elschot)
